VAULTBRIDGE
    Privacy Manifesto

    Privacy Is Not Optional

    VaultBridge exists to make secure sharing possible without surveillance economics.

    Privacy Is Not Optional

    VaultBridge exists because privacy became optional in modern cloud platforms. Most systems optimize for retention, analytics, and engagement. VaultBridge optimizes for confidentiality, minimalism, and user control.

    We Believe Privacy Is a Right

    Privacy should not require accounts. Privacy should not require subscriptions. Privacy should not require trust. Privacy should be enforced by architecture.

    We Minimize Data, Not Maximize It

    VaultBridge does not build profiles. VaultBridge does not track behavior. VaultBridge does not monetize user activity. VaultBridge exists to transfer files securely, and nothing more.

    Files Should Not Exist Forever

    Permanent storage increases risk. VaultBridge is designed around temporary access, controlled lifecycle, and automatic deletion.

    Trust Should Be Technical, Not Marketing

    VaultBridge is built so user privacy does not depend on promises. It depends on system design.

    Our Commitment

    • Privacy-first
    • Minimal
    • Transparent
    • User-controlled
    • Always
